name: Statue of Talos
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

action.name: Headbutt
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
